Class AudioController

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      AudioController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class AudioController
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.ActionListener

An applet/application to provide a User Interface to control a device (had to be an audio device) via UDP packets.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Mario Piccinelli (mario.piccinelli@gmail.com)
See Also:
Serialized Form
